name: heterosexually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to being heterosexual (= sexually or romantically attracted to men if you are a woman, and women if you are a man): I don't think he's heterosexually inclined. Back then people didn't believe HIV could be transmitted heterosexually. Study participants were all men, heterosexually active, and under 35. Almost 25 percent of teens who identify as gay, transgender, or nonbinary experienced bullying at school, compared with only 10% of students who identified heterosexually. See
heterosexual
